name: @neurofoam/build
description: This is the build tool for Neurofoam.

scripts.test: del-cli '**/*.js' '**/*.d.ts' '!**/node_modules/**/*' && tsc --project tools.tsconfig.json && node build && tsc --project packages.tsconfig.json && nyc --check-coverage --all --exclude "**/*-tests.*" --exclude "build/**/*" --exclude "publish/**/*" --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --statements 100 jasmine --config=jasmine.json
